thread.title: Cantona: Suarez’s dive against PSG was football porn
thread.title_full: Cantona: Suarez’s dive against PSG was football porn

author: Okogba
title: Cantona: Suarez’s dive against PSG was football porn
text:
Home » Sports » Cantona: Suarez’s dive against PSG was football porn Cantona: Suarez’s dive against PSG was football porn On 10:37   
Diving deeper into Luis Suarez’s antics and Barcelona’s polemical comeback against Paris Saint-Germain, the charismatic Frenchman and ex-footballer Eric Cantona shared his views in a wide-ranging video. 
Opining on everything from the French presidential elections to Manchester City’s tie against Monaco, not to mention sex, Cantona has never been one to shy away from making the loudest, most provactive statements. 
“Suarez’s dive against PSG was football porn,” he said. “He is not a biter anymore, he is a diver and not a very good one because he is too dramatic. 
“Don’t have sexual relationships when watching football because you might miss something,” he also joked. Okogba
